summary: Enteroviruses have been associated with regional and global epidemics, recently, including with severe disease (Enterovirus A71 and D68), and are of interest as emerging viruses. the geographic distribution of CNS and respiratory cases included in the current study (TIFF 892 kb) Additional file 2: (5.6MB, tiff) Figure S2. Phylogenetic tree analysis of partial VP1 enteroviral sequences (330 bp)
